title: SPECIAL EPISODE: RUTHLESS RADIO THEATRE
description: The cast and crew of the Ruthless variety progrum perform a dramatic reading adapted from Jonathan Swan's reporting of an Oval Office meeting in Trump's White House entitled, "Off the Rails" in Axios.
author: hello@ruthlesspodcast.com (Ruthless Podcast)
